page.title: 07Industry in Halesowen
page.content:
Since the time of the nailers Halesowen and district has always been an area of small metal trades and it continues to be so. Due to the recession in the last decade many of these small firms have closed. Two large metal manufacturers have gone and the remaining ones have reduced manpower and capacity.
We have found:- 4 large firms in metal trades. Somers, Swan, Sandvik and Automotive Products. 39 small firms in metal trades. 17 'others' including woodworkers, plastics, scientific instruments, horn button makers, optical lenses and stationary. 2 new firms in the area making computer parts.
